event.title: was amalgamated with Exton Parish in 2015

data.event: The Parish of Horn with just three properties was amalgamated with Exton Parish in 2015.

event.title: were installed under a thorn tree in 1471

data.event: There had been a church, dedicated to All Saints, but it too fell into disrepair and new rectors were installed under a thorn tree in 1471, and until the last appointment in 1809.
There had been a church, dedicated to All Saints, but it too fell into disrepair and new rectors were installed under a thorn tree in 1471, and until the last appointment in 1809.
